text:
ASL19 | Toronto (Onsite) We are a research and development lab building technology for social good. We work on bypassing Internet censorship to government transparency and accountability projects.

Looking for a DevOps Engineer (https://asl19.org/en/joinus/devops)

We Offer:

- Competitive salary and benefit

- All the hardware you need

- Catered lunch and healthy snacks

- An open culture that welcomes ideas and independence and values dedication.

Email us your resume and a cover letter to: apply at asl19.org
